mixtral-8x7b_direct_sole-planning_result:
Day 1 - March 18, 2022:

* Depart from La Crosse, WI by car at 6:00 AM.
* Arrive in Moline, IL at approximately 9:34 AM. (Estimated travel time: 3 hours and 34 minutes, Distance: 310 km, Cost: $15)
* Check-in to the "Sunny, Spacious, Private Room Close to Train!" accommodation in Moline, IL for a group of 5. ($254/night, total cost for 2 nights: $508, suitable for children under 10 and offers an entire room)
* Rest and freshen up before heading out for lunch or dinner at Biaggi's Ristorante Italiano in Moline, IL. (Estimated cost: $150 for a group of 5)
* Return to the accommodation for the night.

Day 2 - March 19, 2022:

* Spend the day exploring attractions such as the John Deere Pavilion, Figge Art Museum, and Butterworth Center in Moline, IL. (Estimated cost: $50)
* Have lunch at Harris Pizza Moline on Avenue of the Cities. (Estimated cost: $60 for a group of 5)
* In the evening, visit Crawford Brew Works for dinner and drinks. (Estimated cost: $80)
* Return to the accommodation for the night.

Day 3 - March 20, 2022:

* Depart from Moline, IL by car at 6:00 AM.
* Arrive in Rockford, IL at approximately 8:11 AM. (Estimated travel time: 2 hours and 1 minute, Distance: 194 km, Cost: $9)
* Check-in to the "Cozy Room in a Victorian House in Central Brooklyn" accommodation in Rockford, IL for a group of 5. ($370/night, total cost for 2 nights: $740, suitable for children under 10 and offers an entire room)
* Rest and freshen up before heading out for lunch at Stockholm Inn in Rockford, IL. (Estimated cost: $60)
* Spend the day exploring attractions such as the Rockford Art Museum, Nicholas Conservatory & Gardens, and Discovery Center Museum in Rockford, IL. (Estimated cost: $70)
* In the evening, visit Mary's Mediterranean in Rockford, IL for dinner. (Estimated cost: $80)
* Return to the accommodation for the night.

Day 4 - March 21, 2022:

* Spend the day exploring more attractions such as Anderson Japanese Gardens, Klehm Arboretum & Botanic Garden, and Tinker Swiss Cottage Museum in Rockford, IL. (Estimated cost: $70)
* Have lunch at Lino's in Rockford, IL. (Estimated cost: $60)
* In the evening, visit Octane Interlounge for dinner and drinks. (Estimated cost: $80)
* Return to the accommodation for the night.

Day 5 - March 22, 2022:

* Depart from Rockford, IL by car at 6:00 AM.
* Arrive in Belleville, IL at approximately 12:38 PM. (Estimated travel time: 7 hours and 19 minutes, Distance: 792 km, Cost: $39)
* Check-in to the "Entire Home Near Scott Air Force Base" accommodation in Belleville, IL for a group of 5. ($100/night, total cost for 2 nights: $200, suitable for children under 10 and offers an entire room)
* Rest and freshen up before heading out for lunch or dinner at A Piece Of Heaven Cafe in Belleville, IL. (Estimated cost: $80 for a group of 5)
* Spend the rest of the day exploring attractions such as Bellevue Park, National Shrine of Our Lady of the Snows, and Cahokia Mounds State Historic Site in Collinsville, IL. (Estimated cost: $70)
* Return to the accommodation for the night.

Day 6 - March 23, 2022:

* Spend the day exploring more attractions such as Eckert's Country Store & Farms and Gateway Arch National Park in St. Louis, MO. (Estimated cost: $70)
* Have lunch at Sugarfire Smoke House in St. Louis, MO. (Estimated cost: $60 for a group of 5)
* In the evening, visit 33 Wine Shop & Bar in St. Louis, MO for dinner and drinks. (Estimated cost: $80)
* Return to the accommodation for the night.

Day 7 - March 24, 2022:

* Depart from Belleville, IL by car at 6:00 AM.
* Arrive back in La Crosse, WI at approximately 1:39 PM. (Estimated travel time: 7 hours and 19 minutes, Distance: 792 km, Cost: $39)
* Total estimated cost for transportation: $142
* Total estimated cost for accommodations: $1,488
* Total estimated cost for meals: $650
* Total estimated cost for activities and entertainment: $520
* Grand total estimated cost for 7-day travel plan for a group of 5: $3,800. This leaves you with $1,000 in your budget for any additional expenses or contingencies.
